text: Nohoile bhi apnikhan najane naki dharmik nathaka manu khan to Isor laga rajyote jabole na paribo koi kene? Apnikhan dhoka nakhabi; letera kaam khan, nohoile bhi murti puja, nohoile bhi bebichari, nohoile bhi nijor gaw ke bikiri kora khan, nohoile mota-mota aru maiki-maiki biya kaam kora khan,
